description:
Graphite is a Twitter experience designed for webOS tablet--HP Touchpad. It retains the unique webOS experience through sliding UI elements and the use of Cards for managing multiple accounts and composition screens along with Just Type integration for New Tweets & Twitter Search. Oh, and it is Carbon on steroids!

- Signature dots & lines UI & Experience
- Multipane Timelines Screen
- Sliding UI and Panes
- Threaded Messages
- Public Conversation View
- Image Upload: Twitpic and YFrog
- URL shortening with Bit.ly and Bit.ly Pro
- Read Later support with Instapaper & Read It Later
- Username Auto Complete
- Double Tap for Quick Replying
- Quick Timeline
- Inline Media Preview
- Internal Browser
- Rich User Profile View
- Compose Cards
- Account Cards & Fast Account Card switching
- Rich Notifications(on app and when minimized)
- Support for webOS Just Type for Search & New Tweets
